Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NamePhoneGap Build Java API and Maven Plugin
DescriptionThis project aims to provide a stand-alone Java API for communicating with the PhoneGap Build REST API and a Maven Plugin which makes use of the API to turn WAR projects into binaries for mobile platforms.
Homepagehttps://github.com/chrisprice/phonegap-build
